reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: RWL SEE - Women together in support to Brussels agreement

description.narrative: Embassy has had cooperation with RWL SEE in 2013 and the cooperation went well and the organization implemented all the foreseen activities. This year?s project is ?Women together in support to Brussels agreement? involving Kosovo Serb and Albanian women m embers of parliament from Serbia and Kosovo and the RWL SEE members. The overall objective of the project is to establish a vibrant forum of women leaders within Kosovo to exchange information and experience and to contribute to breaking the barriers of mi strust and suspicion of Serb and Albanian communities by directly engaging women from these communities. UN Women will support the project with 17 290 EUR.
